Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    io.spine.base.ConversionException
    This type has been out of use for a while. Will be deleted in future releases.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.spine.validate.FieldValue.asList()
    Use FieldValue.values() instead.
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkBounds(int, String, int, int)
    please use Preconditions2.checkBounds(int, String, int, int)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkDefault(M)
    If you really need to check that a message is its default state, please use checkState(isDefault(msg));
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkDefault(M, Object)
    If you really need to check that a message is in the default state, please use checkState(isDefault(object), errorMessage);
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkDefault(M, String, Object...)
    If you really need to check that a message is in the default state, please use checkState(isDefault(object), template, arg1, arg2, arg3);
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkNotDefault(M)
    please use Preconditions2.checkNotDefaultArg(Message) or Preconditions2.checkNotDefaultState(Message)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkNotDefault(M, Object)
    please use Preconditions2.checkNotDefaultArg(Message, Object) or Preconditions2.checkNotDefaultState(Message, Object)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkNotDefault(M, String, Object...)
    please use Preconditions2.checkNotDefaultState(Message, String, Object...)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkNotEmptyOrBlank(String, String)
    please use Preconditions2.checkNotEmptyOrBlank(String, String, Object...)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkParameter(boolean, String, String)
    please use Preconditions.checkArgument(boolean, String, Object...)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkPositive(long)
    please use Preconditions2.checkPositive(long)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.checkPositive(long, String)
    please use Preconditions2.checkPositive(long, String, Object...)
    io.spine.option.PatternOption.Builder.clearFlag()
    io.spine.io.Resource.file(String)
    Using the ClassLoader of this class may lead to unexpected behaviour. As this overload uses the ClassLoader of the Resource class, it might be unable to find some resources. For example, some environments use an isolated class loader for each dependency JAR, and so the Resource class loader would not be able to find resource files in neighbouring JARs. Please specify a ClassLoader explicitly via Resource.file(String, ClassLoader). This overload will be deleted in a future release.
    io.spine.base.Error.getAttributes()
    io.spine.base.Error.Builder.getAttributes()
    io.spine.base.ErrorOrBuilder.getAttributes()
    io.spine.option.PatternOption.getFlag()
    io.spine.option.PatternOption.Builder.getFlag()
    io.spine.option.PatternOptionOrBuilder.getFlag()
    io.spine.base.Error.Builder.getMutableAttributes()
    io.spine.validate.Validate.isDefault(Message)
    please use Messages.isDefault(Message)
    io.spine.validate.Validate.isNotDefault(Message)
    please use Messages.isNotDefault(Message)
    io.spine.base.Environment.isProduction()
    use Environment.instance().is(Production.class)
    io.spine.code.proto.SourceFile.isRejections()
    Source file must not know if it matches a convention for specific types, such as rejections. Use RejectionsFile instead.
    io.spine.base.Environment.isTests()
    use Environment.instance().is(Tests.class)
    io.spine.option.PatternOption.Builder.setFlag(int)
    io.spine.base.Environment.setToProduction()
    use Environment.setTo(Class)
    io.spine.base.Environment.setToTests()
    use Environment.setTo(Class)
    io.spine.net.Uri.Schema.valueOf(int)
    Use Uri.Schema.forNumber(int) instead.
    io.spine.net.Uri.Protocol.ProtocolCase.valueOf(int)
    Use Uri.Protocol.ProtocolCase.forNumber(int) instead.
    io.spine.option.EntityOption.Kind.valueOf(int)
    Use EntityOption.Kind.forNumber(int) instead.
    io.spine.option.EntityOption.Visibility.valueOf(int)
    Use EntityOption.Visibility.forNumber(int) instead.
    io.spine.ui.Language.valueOf(int)
    Use Language.forNumber(int) instead.
